actions.description: The bag jelly makes two Pseudopod attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d6 + 1) acid damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the grappled condition (escape DC 11). Ability checks made to escape this grapple have disadvantage.
actions.name: Pseudopod

name: Bag Jelly [BGG]
senses: blindsight 60 ft. (can't see beyond this radius)

specialTraits.description: The bag jelly can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing.
specialTraits.name: Amorphous
